episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_0100:
Fight or fright!
If I win, you have to give me your candy!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_0200:
Fight or fwight!
Don’t go easy on me just b’cause I’m wittle!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_0301_0300:
I wonder where Acerola and
Hilbert are...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_0401_0400:
Pikachu spotted a Mimikyu nearby.
Something about it seemed oddly familiar...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_0302_0500: Wow, the city’s all decked out!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_0402_0600:
Pikachu spotted a Mimikyu nearby.
Something about it seemed oddly familiar...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_0700:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! It’s you!
Looks like you found my Mimikyu!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_0800:
We were a little worried at first since he bolted
all of a sudden. Glad you found each other!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_0900:
He must have run off when he spotted you
and Pikachu!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_1000:
Y’know, I think I read somewhere that Mimikyu
disguise themselves as Pikachu to get close to
people and other Pokémon...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_1100:
Have you noticed that your Pikachu hasn’t stopped
staring at Acerola’s Mimikyu since you arrived?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_1200: Maybe Mimikyu’s disguise is making him curious.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_1300:
Now that you mention it, I think I saw Pikachu
staring at Mimikyu while we were in the
Pokémon Center, too!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_1400:
If he’s giving you this much attention, he must
really want to be your friend, Mimikyu!
Isn’t that great?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_0401_1600:
Oh, she’s not here today! She and Oshawott are
playing with some kids at the beach.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_0402_1800:
Yeah! He and I are partners tonight.
Oshawott is over at the beach playing with
Acerola’s Palossand.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_1900:
We didn’t want to disturb all the fun they
were having, so we let them stay and play.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_2000:
Yep! I’m gonna collect a whooole bunch of candy
tonight so I can share it with everyone back at
the beach!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_2100:
In that case, you’d better get your special shout
ready! We’ve got a bunch of battles to win!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4001_1001_2200:
You got it! Mimikyu and I will be scooping up all
the competition tonight!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_0200:
I hope you accept my challenge, because if you
don’t... Tee-hee! You’ll have to face my bag of
tricks instead!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_0400:
I don’t know about you, but I prefer Pokémon
battling to getting the pants scared off of me!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_0500: Woo-hoo! Look at all the candy I won!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_0600:
Nice! Looks like you’ve already got a pretty good
stash. This is just the beginning, though!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_0700: Yep! The real battles are just getting started!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_0401_0900:
Haha! Aren’t you funny tonight!
’Tis I, a worthy challenger!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_0402_1100:
Haha! I thought I could surprise you, but you’re
too quick for me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_1200:
Come on, let’s have a Pokémon battle!
Hilbert, I challenge you!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_1300:
Hang on a sec! Challenging me to a battle is
totally fine, but...you do know what’s going on
tonight, right?!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_1400:
Of course! Wherever the Pokémon battles are,
that’s where I’m gonna be. No one loves battling
more than me!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_1500:
Right... But we’re not just battling tonight.
There’s candy and...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_1600:
If you want to challenge somebody to a battle,
there’s a special rule you have to remember!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_1700:
Ohhh, I know what you’re talking about!
Haha! OK!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_1800:
Wait, you DO know about the special rule then?
Phew, that’s good...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_1900:
Duh! “If two Trainers’ eyes meet, they’ve got to
have a Pokémon battle!” Come on, let’s go! I’m
coming at you with everything I’ve got!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_2000:
Huh? No, no! That’s not the rule we’re talking
about, Hilda!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_2100:
All right, the battle’s over now, Hilda.
*sigh* This is getting exhausting...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_2200:
Exhausted already? You’re just getting lazy now,
Hilbert. Remember how hard we used to fight on
the Battle Subway?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_2300:
Yeah, of course I do. But battling isn’t what’s
making me exhausted... Listen, Hilda. I think
you’re confused.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_2400: Huh? What are you talking about?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_2500:
Ohhh... Fight or fright, huh? Why didn’t you just
tell me all of that in the first place?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_2600:
Acerola tried, but you rushed us into a battle
before she could finish explaining...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_2700:
Whoops! Hehe... We can just, y’know, forget all
that happened, though, right?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_2800:
Besides, if you’re looking for candy, I think I might
have a lead for you! The people I battled earlier
actually gave me some!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_2900: Really?! Can you tell us where they are?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4002_1001_3000:
Sure! After such a great battle with you guys,
it’s the least I could do!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_0100: I’m pretty sure this is the spot Hilda mentioned...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_0401_0300:
I know this spot! Ghost Pokémon love to lurk
around in places like this!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_0302_0400: I think this forest is haunted...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_0402_0500:
Tee-hee! I know this spot! Ghost Pokémon love to
lurk around in places like this!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_0600:
I wonder if there are any cuties floating around
the forest now.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_0700:
Now that you mention it...this place does kind of
give me the heebie-jeebies.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_0800:
(If anything happens, it’ll be up to me to
protect everyone!)
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_0900:
Oh my gosh! What a cutie! Where did you come
from, buddy?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_1000:
It couldn’t be a wild Pokémon, could it? There
aren’t supposed to be any on Pasio...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_1100:
Wait, I think something else is hiding over there!
Everyone, get behind me!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_1200:
Yay! It’s another Ghost Pokémon! Tonight must be
my lucky night, you guys!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_1300:
And where did you come from, cutie pie?
Wanna come play in the forest with us?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_1400:
Something’s not right here... That’s the second
Pokémon we’ve encountered without its
Trainer tonight...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_0301_1500: I saw something in the bushes!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_0401_1600:
*gulp*
Y-you don’t think that was a...a...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_0402_1800:
*gulp*
Y-you don’t think that was a...a...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_2000: All right! Let’s do this, Mightyena!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_2100:
Oh my gosh! It’s a Chandelure!
Look how cute it is! Ahhhh!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_2200:
Wait a sec... I feel like I’ve seen these three
Pokémon together somewhere before...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4003_1001_2400: Huh? I think I recognize that voice...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_0100:
“The knight stood bravely in front of the beautiful
princess, ready to protect her from harm...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_0200:
“He had no choice but to unleash the dark powers
sealed within him. Fangs bared, he leaped at
the enemy!”
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_0300:
Oh my goodness, you two are simply perfect!
Yes...I haven’t felt this inspired in weeks!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_0400:
I didn’t think I could make someone so happy just
by wearing a costume! I’m glad I dressed up.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_0500:
Me too! The look on Shauntal’s face alone makes
all the effort worth it. She looks so happy!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_0401_0700:
Ahh, there you are, Shaunt— Wait, what’s going
on here?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_0402_0900:
Ahh, we were wondering where you ran off to,
Shauntal... What’s all this, then, hm?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_1000:
I came this way looking for our Pokémon, but I
ended up finding Acerola and the others, too!
We were just chatting a bit!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_1100:
A bit, huh? All of that fresh ink in your notebook
seems to suggest otherwise.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_1200:
Oh, how could I NOT write, Morty? Have you
seen the wonderful costumes these two are
wearing tonight?!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_1300:
Acerola looks like the spitting image of Mimikyu
in that adorable hood, doesn’t she? It’s like she
used Disguise herself!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_1400:
And Hilbert looks just like a Mightyena lurking
in the shadows, waiting for the perfect opportunity
to leap out and catch his prey!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_1500:
With such perfect muses right before my eyes,
this novel is practically writing itself!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_1600:
That’s all fine and dandy, as long as you
haven’t forgotten the reason we came here in
the first place.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_1700:
Wait a minute... Did you three come here to
get candy, too?!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_1800:
Candy? Ah, you mean that “fight or fright” thing...
Sorry, child. That’s not why we’re here.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_1900: We’ve all gathered here for the Midnight Parade.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_2000:
We Ghost-type users are going to march through
town with our Pokémon while all of the spooky
decorations are on display.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_2100:
The magical, mysterious atmosphere downtown
inspired us to do something extra special!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_2200:
We’re hoping that other Ghost-type users will
come and enjoy the parade with us as well.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_2300:
The Midnight Parade?! That sounds so amazing!
Can I march, too? I want to be in the parade!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_0401_2500:
I had a feeling you’d say that. What do you think,
Morty? Shauntal?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_0402_2700:
Do you want to join in, too, then? Morty, Shauntal,
what do you think?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_2800:
I would love to have all of you join the parade!
But first, we’ll need to make sure you’re apt
to participate, right, Morty?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_2900:
That’s right. If you can prove your knowledge of
Ghost-type Pokémon by defeating us in a battle,
you can join us in the parade.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_3000:
And as long as you say the magic words,
we’ll throw some candy in as well.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_3100: Really?! You’ll give us candy, too?!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_3200:
In that case, I’ll give this battle everything
I’ve got! No holding back!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4004_1001_3300:
Come on, guys! That candy is as good as ours!
Fight or fright!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4005_1001_0100:
“The three challengers fought tooth and nail to
earn the right to march in the Midnight Parade...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4005_1001_0200:
“And when the battle ended, they smiled in
triumph, knowing they had proven themselves
worthy of the honor.”
episode_event_autumn_2020/4005_1001_0300:
What a magnificent battle! I’m sure you’ll do
wonderfully in the parade!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4005_1001_0400:
Agreed. You three did impressively well.
I almost want to ask for a rematch just so that
we can continue training together...
episode_event_autumn_2020/4005_1001_0500: But I suppose that can wait for another time.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4005_1001_0600:
Oh ho! I think that would be wise, Morty!
Best you save that secret training of yours
for another day.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4005_1001_0700:
Now, then! I think it’s time we show Pasio just
how magnificent we Ghost-type users can be.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_0100:
Yay, yay! Sooo many ghooosts!
Look, it’s Mimikyu! Cuuuute!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_0200:
Tee-hee! Mimikyu’s probably so happy to have
fans who think he’s cute!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_0300:
Whoa! Where did you get that costume, Bro?!
You look so cooool!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_0400: Thanks! Mightyena and I are twins today!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_0500:
Mightyena looks so cool, toooo! Can we have a
battle?! I wanna see you guys fight together!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_0600:
Did I hear something about a battle?
Don’t forget about me!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_0700:
Me too! Me too! I wanna battle, too!
Fight or fwight!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_0800: It looks like the Ghost Pokémon are a hit.
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_0900: They all look happier than a hero in a fairy tale!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_1000:
I guess it’s good to do something festive every
now and again, eh?
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_1100: You’re on, kids! Bet you can’t beat meee!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_1200:
Haha! I don’t plan on losing, either! Come on,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s do this!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_1300:
Your candy is gonna be all mine! Haha!
Here I go! Fight or fright!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_0401_1500:
Nice one! Let’s give these kids a run for
their candy!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_0302_1600: No way! Your candy is ours!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_0402_1700: All right, then! It’s time to fight or fright!
episode_event_autumn_2020/4006_1001_1800:
We’re gonna scoop up this battle and scoot away
with all your candy! Tee-hee!
